main event: A glowing, round object was observed shooting across the sky and disappearing rapidly.
interesting points: The object was observed both on ground-radar and visually by an air observer.
The object was described as round and glowing as white hot.
The object's movement was characterized as shooting across the sky and disappearing rapidly.
The duration of the sighting was estimated to be 7 minutes.
The report concludes that the object was likely a meteor, with the duration being overestimated.
location: 4 Mi SE of Eagle Springs, N.C.
